revised_title: Discovery of a New Species of Trypanosoma in Cattle
tldr: The author, David Bruce, reports the discovery of a new species of Trypanosoma in cattle from South Africa. This new species is larger than other known Trypanosomas and only infects cattle. The disease it causes is an acute pernicious anemia, and Dr. Theiler, who discovered it, proposes naming it Trypanosoma Theileri.
